AboutIntro.title: About
AboutIntro.description: Student | Machine Learning | Quantitative Research | BSc Business Analytics School of Computing |

About.about_paragraph: As a student in National University of Singapore, passionate about Machine Learning and Quantitative Finance, my journey has been a blend of hands-on experience, academic excellence, and a commitment to pushing the boundaries of knowledge in this dynamic field. I'm eager to channel my expertise and passion into real-world challenges, contributing to the ever-evolving landscape of quantitative finance and machine learning with innovation and dedication.

work_experience.title: Quantitative Analyst Intern
work_experience.description: Built a LLM model to conduct Sentiment Analysis on SGX Universe stocks. Developed multiple multi-factor, model-based systematic trading strategies with Sharpe Ratios exceeding 1.5, employing portfolio optimization, reinforcement learning, and various evaluation techniques.

work_experience.title: Quantitative Research Consultant
work_experience.description: Built an Alpha Generation Engine in Python, algorithmically searching, constructing alpha expressions based on financial market analyses and quantitative research on equities portfolio trading strategies

work_experience.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work_experience.description: Developed responsive user interface for Azendian's Real-Time Dashboard using React.js. Implemented multiple scalable RESTful APIs on Express.js server-side applications, integrating with Azure and PostgreSQL database

work_experience.title: Data Analytics and Visualization Intern
work_experience.description: Constructed multiple end-to-end Power BI data models for the Business Management team, streamlining and automating monthly financial reporting process of data cleaning, data aggregation and dashboard building.

ResumeIntro.title: Resume
ResumeIntro.description: A brief account of my professional experience, my past projects, my continuing education, and my technical skills. Feel free to use this document for job application purposes.

PapersIntro.title: Research
PapersIntro.description: A running history of my past research experience. Contains various topics including Image Classification, Object Detection, Natural Language Processing, Generative Adversarial Networks, Adversarial AI, Super Resolution and Game Agents.

latest_papers.title: Soft Labels for Satellite Object Detection
latest_papers.subtitle: Matthew Ciolino, Grant Rosario, David Noever
latest_papers.description: The paper examines the use of soft labels in satellite object detection using a YOLOv5 model on the xView dataset to detect cars, planes, and ships. Training on soft labels resulted in similar accuracy to the original dataset.

ProjectsIntro.title: Projects
ProjectsIntro.description: Compilation of my personal projects, showcasing the application of academic and technical skills acquired through hands-on experience, while exploring my personal interests.

Market Making: IMC Prosperity Challenge.title: Market Making: IMC Prosperity Challenge

Hedging IL and Optimising Fee Returns wi.title: Hedging IL and Optimising Fee Returns with ARIMA-GARCH
Hedging IL and Optimising Fee Returns wi.description: Quantitative Strategy for hedging impermanent loss and generating fee returns for liquidity providers in Uniswap V3 using ARIMA-GARCH, options and futures

RF-Optimization.title: Portfolio Optimization using Random Forest Selection
RF-Optimization.description: Machine Learning Forecasting for Stock Selection and Portfolio Optimization

Streamlit-LSTM.description: Stock Price Prediction using LSTM with LSTM Intra-Day Strategy Backtesting

Orbital-BGS.title: Orbital: Fur-Ever-Home
Orbital-BGS.description: Full Stack Application connecting pet owners with stray pets and shelter animals through a Tinder-like interface

Algorithmic_Trading_using_XGBoost.title: Algorithmic Trading using XGBoost
